en-US: What kind of receipt is this?
Did I order takeout or dine-in?
zh-HK: 我點嘅係外賣仲係堂食？

en-US: When did I make this order?
How much discount did I get?
What is the price after discount?
What payment method did I use?
zh-HK: 我使用咗乜嘢付款方式？

en-US: How much money was deducted from my card?
zh-HK: 從我嘅卡中扣除咗幾多錢？

en-US: How much money was remained from my card?
What is the name of the company that provided the payment terminal used?
zh-HK: 提供所用支付終端嘅公司名稱係乜嘢？

en-US: What is the address of this company named UGREEN?
zh-HK: 呢間名為绿联嘅公司地址係乜嘢？

en-US: I asked for less salt on my meal. Did the waiter include this on the order?
zh-HK: 我要求少食啲鹽。 侍應是否在訂單中包含咗呢個？

en-US: I will get a haircut next. The haircut will cost 200 HK dollar. Do I have enough money in my Octopus card?
zh-HK: 我接下來要去理髮。 理髮費用為200蚊。 我嘅八達通卡度有足夠嘅錢呀？

en-US: What is the name of the waiter?
